function v_to_z,v,just_cz=just_cz,double=double if n_elements(double) ne 1 then double=0 if n_elements(just_cz) ne 1 then just_cz=get_cz() ; relativistic or not ? on_error,2 ;Return to caller if N_params() ne 1 or n_elements(v) eq 0 then $ message,'Syntax -> z=v_to_z(V,just_cz=just_cz,double=double) ; c=get_c() dv=double(v) dvc=double(dv/c) if just_cz then return,(double ? dvc : dvc) one=double(1.0) z12=(one+dvc)/(one-dvc) z=sqrt(z12)-one return,(double ? z : float(z)) ; end
